AI Description: CNVkit is a software toolkit for copy number variation (CNV) detection and genotyping from targeted DNA sequencing data. It is designed to handle shallow coverage whole-exome and panel target sequencing from tumor-normal pairs.
Core Features: Detection & Genotyping Of Copy Number Variations (Cnvs), Handling Shallow Coverage Whole-Exome & Panel Target Sequencing Data, Analysis Of Tumor-Normal Pairs
